name: Roll'd
description: Enter the world of Roll'd where rolling comes in at a new degree.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.0 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia 320M or higher, or Radeon 7000 or higher, or Intel HD 3000 or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews.review_text: This game is incredible and for $.99 everyone in the world should buy it and play it at least once.
Worth the $0.21 I paid for it.

Review copy provided from developer. Note that my ability to enjoy a game is not influenced by how I recieved it. If you would like to see the TL;DR, go to the summary at the bottom of the review.    Roll'd
Things this game will never do:    Give you up    Let you down    Run around    Desert you   -Sincerely, Rick
Fun, simple, original. Easy to grasp gameplay, a variety of art styles, and a good (though mundane) soundtrack. Definitely worth it if you have an extra dollar lying around. 8.5/10
Press left arrow. Press arrow. Be bored.
